body:
I don't think there's a way to find a complete list of users who have blocked me, so I'm going to update this list as I find more users

1. ~~@citwrong - because I repeatedly asked them to ban me from +trans (and they never did lol)~~
2. @CraneChops - Who? [The only thing I know about him is that he once yanked posts into a guild and set it to private to shut down discussion](https://ruqqus.com/+BetaFeedback/post/4zwl/a-way-to-prevent-your-post/hkuk).
3. @Mounties

Edit 2020-12-01: @citwrong used to be called @citronboy, but @captainmeta4 changed their username (On discord, captainmeta4 said this to citwrong: "that said if you'd prefer to use a different name I can update your Ruqqus account to keep the names matching" after citwrong said this: "i'm not boi, how do i change this")

I wonder if anyone else has ever had their usernames changed.

Edit 2020-12-04: Added @CraneChops

Edit 2020-12-17: Added @Mounties

Edit 2020-12-20: @citwrong unblocked me, but I don't know when they did that.
body_html:
I don't think there's a way to find a complete list of users who have blocked me, so I'm going to update this list as I find more users

  1. @citwrong - because I repeatedly asked them to ban me from +trans (and they never did lol)
  2. @CraneChops - Who? The only thing I know about him is that he once yanked posts into a guild and set it to private to shut down discussion.
  3. @Mounties

Edit 2020-12-01: @citwrong used to be called @citronboy, but @captainmeta4 changed their username (On discord, captainmeta4 said this to citwrong: "that said if you'd prefer to use a different name I can update your Ruqqus account to keep the names matching" after citwrong said this: "i'm not boi, how do i change this")

I wonder if anyone else has ever had their usernames changed.

Edit 2020-12-04: Added @CraneChops

Edit 2020-12-17: Added @Mounties

Edit 2020-12-20: @citwrong unblocked me, but I don't know when they did that.

guild.description:
The future of intellectual discourse. Art Through Drama. Discovery By Shitposts. Knowledge From Memes.

Glory to the eternal chairman and his earthly incarnation @kek

ＲＵＬＥＳ

@Slavchad's [video](https://ruqq.us/1o9m)

body:
@captainmeta4 I don't know what's going on here, but sometimes when I upvote a comment, the initial upvote disappears, and my vote doesn't work. I've encountered this issue multiple times when upvoting your and other users' comments.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
@captainmeta4 I don't know what's going on here, but sometimes when I upvote a comment, the initial upvote disappears, and my vote doesn't work. I've encountered this issue multiple times when upvoting your and other users' comments.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body:
(I probably should've realized by now that none of my votes are going to work.)

Yeah. When you hover over the vote count, it says `+0|-0`, so at least others will know that I didn't actually downvote you. (By the way, downvoting isn't working for me either.)

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

Edit 2020-12-01: @citwrong used to be called @citronboy, but @captainmeta4 changed their username (On discord, captainmeta4 said this to citwrong: "that said if you'd prefer to use a different name I can update your Ruqqus account to keep the names matching" after citwrong said this: "i'm not boi, how do i change this")

I wonder if anyone else has ever had their usernames changed.

body:
@captainmeta4, can I suggest changes in regards to the user blocking feature?

1\. If you're a guildmaster, comments from users you've blocked should be visible or collapsed, not hidden.

Current behavior: If you're a guildmaster, you can see posts from blocked users, but not comments from blocked users. You can also see comments from users who have blocked you (which is good), but not if you've also blocked them.

2\. You should be able to see heralded posts/comments from users who've blocked you or users you've blocked (or else guildmasters would probably have a harder time modding their guilds). I think it would be okay if these comments were collapsed though.

Current behavior: Heralding does not seem to affect the visibility of comments or posts for the blocker or the user being blocked.

3\. You should be able to see pinned comments from users you've blocked or users who've blocked you.

Current behavior: Pinning affects the visibility of posts (you can see pinned posts from users you've blocked or users who've blocked you), but not the visibility of comments.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
@captainmeta4, can I suggest changes in regards to the user blocking feature?

1. If you're a guildmaster, comments from users you've blocked should be visible or collapsed, not hidden.

Current behavior: If you're a guildmaster, you can see posts from blocked users, but not comments from blocked users. You can also see comments from users who have blocked you (which is good), but not if you've also blocked them.

2. You should be able to see heralded posts/comments from users who've blocked you or users you've blocked (or else guildmasters would probably have a harder time modding their guilds). I think it would be okay if these comments were collapsed though.

Current behavior: Heralding does not seem to affect the visibility of comments or posts for the blocker or the user being blocked.

3. You should be able to see pinned comments from users you've blocked or users who've blocked you.

Current behavior: Pinning affects the visibility of posts (you can see pinned posts from users you've blocked or users who've blocked you), but not the visibility of comments.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
